title: Data Preview Not Refreshing After Applying Filter in Chart Editor's Select Data Page
description: When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview does not refresh.
OB: When applying a filter on a Join dataset in the chart editor's select data page, the data preview does not refresh. The issue can be observed in the attached file.
EB: After applying a filter with the condition row["Data Set1::EMPLOYEEID"] = 1, the expected behavior is that the data preview should refresh to reflect the changes caused by the filter.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the attached file.
2. Click on a filter with the condition row["Data Set1::EMPLOYEEID"] = 1.
3. Observe that the data preview does not update as expected, despite the filter having an effect.
